bibl.title: Zenon Papyri. Business Papers of the Third Century B.C. Dealing with Palestine and Egypt. II.
bibl.seg: Westermann William Linn, Clinton Walker Keyes and Herbert Liebesny, Zenon Papyri. Business Papers of the Third Century B.C. Dealing with Palestine and Egypt. II. (Columbia Papyri. Greek Series. IV.)
New York, Columbia University Press, 1940, 4°, x-221 pp. et 7 pll.

C.R. par Elinor M. Husselman, CW 35 (1942) pp. 177-178. - A.C. Johnson, AHR 47 (1942) pp. 312-314. - Frederic G. Kenyon, ArchJ 98 (1941) pp. 212-214. - Orsamus M. Pearl, CJ 40 (1945) pp. 367-369. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 16 (1941) No. 32, pp. 267-275. - C.B. Welles, CP 37 (1942) pp. 432-437. - Ulrich Wilcken, ArchPF 14 (1941) pp. 152-156. - Herbert C. Youtie, AJP 64 (1943) pp. 211-217, reproduit dans: Scriptiunculae. II (Amsterdam, 1973) pp. 791-798.
